description: This course provides a broad overview of human functional anatomy with focus on the muscular, skeletal & nervous systems. Topics include i) tissue organization and mechanical properties; ii) integration of the muscular, skeletal & nervous systems for movement; and iii) the influence of maturation, ageing, exercise, immobilisation and injury on components of the musculoskeletal system.
restricted: BENS, BHMS, BExSS, BExSS(Hons), BCEP(Hons), BHSPE, BExSS/BBusMan, Study Abroad, Incoming Exchange
